Question.Subject: I have a "virus and my Rogers AntiVirus can't delete it please help?
Question.Content: The virus is called Security AntiVirus and it's not exactly a virus but it says that its an antiVirus but its realy not i scanned with rogers anti virus then this and this says there are like 100 virus and rogers says i dont have any.Ok i tried deleting i tried recycle deleting it i tried using rogers online protection to remove it but nothing works PLEASE tell me how to remove its not dangerous but VERY annoying i cant even play a video game for 10 minutes without it popping up and saying "Security antivirus has spotted 87 viruses" or "89 Infected mail recieved"
Question.ChosenAnswer: antivirus tips and antivirus download: http://merakit-komputer.com http://merakit-komputer.com

Answer.Content: Rogers Antivirus?? whatever that is, you'll want to get rid of that too. Go here and download Malwarebytes Antimalware and do a full scan, you may have to boot up in safe mode first. Get rid of the Rogers thing, and download a good free AV like Avira or Avast

Go here for the step by step instructions to remove this virus:
http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/virus-removal/remove-security-antivirus
